name: Stacked Together
description:
Warning! Before you download this game I just want to say that it's very unfinished and has a couple of bugs. This is mainly due to the fact that on Sunday, because of some unexpected events, I was busy almost the entire day. Play this game if you like to play unfinished and buggy games.

This game is a 2D Platformer about jumping on enemies to stack together and get taller.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows or A and D keys for moving

Space or W Key for jumping.

R to restart the level

This is my 3rd Game jam and I had a lot of fun. Sure this game is very bad, but the experience I had is something I'll never forget. Met so many nice people. Thanks to Mark for hosting this jam!
